message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but $9,000 is a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to pay $8,500 for the product.  Let me know if you're interested.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $9,250
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $9,250 is still a bit high for me.  I'm comfortable paying $8,750.  Let's meet in the middle, I think that's fair for both of us.

I understand you're looking for a fair deal, Bob. I can see you're willing to pay a good price. I'm willing to meet you at $9,000, but I need to make sure I get a decent profit. Let's see if we can meet in the middle
